channel.title: Cloud Solution Architects
channel.itunes:subtitle: A podcast where we talk to humans working on Cloud Technologies like Azure, about interesting Cloud projects and the human side behind working in this space.
channel.itunes:author: Anand Kumar R
channel.description: Cloud Solution Architects podcasts brings you the wealth of wisdom from solution architects across the globe working on azure solving critical business problems and changing the world with azure. For more cloud solution architect podcast episodes, animated azure videos, and simplified how-to content articles please check out www.azuremonk.com.
channel.webMaster: ranand12@gmail.com ({"name"=>"anand kumar r", "avatar"=>"/assets/images/anandpic.png", "bio"=>"sr cloud solution srchitect @ microsoft", "links"=>[{"label"=>"website", "icon"=>"fas fa-fw fa-link", "url"=>"https://www.azuremonk.com"}, {"label"=>"twitter", "icon"=>"fab fa-fw fa-twitter-square", "url"=>"https://twitter.com/ranand12"}, {"label"=>"github", "icon"=>"fab fa-fw fa-github", "url"=>"https://github.com/ranand12"}, {"label"=>"linkedin", "icon"=>"fab fa-fw fa-linkedin", "url"=>"https://www.linkedin.com/in/ranand12"}]})

item.title: how goals failed me - and what worked in 2019
